articles.author: Anjolie Singh
articles.title: Why has South Africa taken Israel to the International Court of Justice? - The Indian Express
articles.description: On January 11-12, the UN's principal judicial organ will hear arguments that Israel is committing genocide in Gaza. What exactly is 'genocide', and why is South Africa getting involved in an Israeli-Palestinian issue?
articles.content: Starting Thursday (January 11), the International Court of Justice (ICJ) will hold a two-day hearing to decide whether it will order provisional measures (the equivalent of seeking urgent interim rel… [+6480 chars]
